Meh, Hexakill on SR doesn't differ that much than on TT. It's a very slight modification to the meta. an extra support or an extra Jungler. 

On TT, Their's no room to really think about a meta. (though some people could imagine one.) Probably part of the reason why everyone thinks Assassins are the core of that mode. And even though they could work. If you end up with a team of 6 assassins, get ready for a kick in the balls.

People forget that Assassins are single target, Even if you where playing a clean up assassin like Kat or Yi, you will likely get crunched by someone who can do a lot of AoE damage (Cause TT is fairly close quarters) Personally my goto champ is Karthus. Because a) he does a lot of AoE damage, and has a lot of team fight tools. b) because of the high death nature of the game mode, his passive gets a lot of mileage, and c) because he can patiently stack a tear and a RoA, I find him less CS reliant, than some other champs)
Play it to earn the summoner icon/icons then back to the rift.
urf should be here longer due to an unexplained long lasting cold season
Please bring back one for all im {{item:3070}} its so fun

Riot, while I enjoy your featured game modes, I just kind of think that it is about time for a new map/gamemode, I mean how long has it been since Dominion came out? About 2 years now I think, and that is quite awhile, plus Dominion and Twisted Treeline have been completely overrun by bots in Bronze/Silver and anything below level 30, which pretty much leaves only ARAM and Summoner's Rift as gamemode options.

Not a HUGE change as a custom gamemode as adding 6 players to a 6 player map, but can you do a SR custom game mode where the number of item slots goes from 6 to 8? I've always been curious how things would be different in that case. Thank You though Riot for adding bans to Hexakill!
